name: Debilitate
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Target creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, choose a stat. That creature treats that stat as if it was 4 points lower for the duration. This can cause the creature's maximum hit points or AC to change, but can't deal damage by itself - hit points over the maximum are treated as temporary hit points.

The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ignoring the spell for the purposes of this saving throw only. On a success, the spell ends.
empower: Choose one - choose a second stat, which is treated as if it was 2 points lower, or range increased to 60 feet.
